channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: This time on Shark Bites, Steve Backshall looks at our very own gentle giant. The basking shark is a huge shark that we have right here in the UK, and for such a sizeable shark, it has a somewhat surprising diet. It visits our coastal waters every spring and summer, and Steve heads to his shark lab to reveal why.
